name: CreateBulkInvites
description:
Create bulk invites for an organization.

This tool facilitates the creation of multiple invites within an organization using Datadog's bulk invite endpoint. It should be called when there's a need to send several invites at once.

parameters.name: organization_identifier
parameters.description: The unique string ID of the organization where you want to create bulk invites.

parameters.name: bulk_invite_request_body
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details of each invite including 'id', 'target_email', 'first_name', 'emailing_attempt_made', 'level', 'is_expired', 'created_by', 'created_at', 'updated_at', 'message', 'private_project_access', 'send_email', 'combine_pending_invites'.

is_expired.description: Check if invite is older than INVITE_DAYS_VALIDITY days.

private_project_access.description: List of team IDs and corresponding access levels to private projects.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the PostHog API.

is_expired.description: Check if invite is older than INVITE_DAYS_VALIDITY days.

private_project_access.description: List of team IDs and corresponding access levels to private projects.
